name: Wave Hokey - GGJ17
description:
Controls

Red Disk

W,A,S,D Keys : Movement

Space key: Launch Wave

Green Disk

Arrow Keys(Up, Down, Left, Right) : Movement

Left Mouse Button: Launch Wave

You Can download for Windows below.

It has xbox controller support for Green Disk.

Objective:

Throw blue disk towards opponent goal using waves that born from your disk's center, be the first on made 10 points to win.
